eu.digitisation.ocr

Class ErrorMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.digitisation.ocr.ErrorMeasure

  • public class ErrorMeasure
extends Object
    Computes character and word error rates by comparing two texts
    Version:
    2012.06.20

      • cer

        public static double cer(String s1,
         String s2)
        Compute character error rate using Levenshtein distance
        Parameters:
        s1 - the reference text
        s2 - fuzzy text
        Returns:
        character error rate with respect to the reference file

      • cerDL

        public static double cerDL(String s1,
           String s2)
        Compute character error rate using Damerau-Levenshtein distance
        Parameters:
        s1 - the reference text
        s2 - fuzzy text
        Returns:
        character error rate with respect to the reference file

      • wer

        public static double wer(String s1,
         String s2)
        Compute word error rate
        Parameters:
        s1 - reference text
        s2 - fuzzy text
        Returns:
        word error rate with respect to first file

      • stats

        public static Element stats(String s1,
            String s2)
        Prints separate statistics of errors for every character
        Parameters:
        s1 - the reference text
        s2 - the fuzzy text
        Returns:
        an element containing table with the statistics: one character per row and one edit operation per column.

      • stats2CSV

        public static String stats2CSV(String s1,
               String s2,
               String recordSeparator,
               String fieldSeparator)
        Prints separate statistics of errors for every character
        Parameters:
        s1 - the reference text
        s2 - the fuzzy text
        recordSeparator - text between data records
        fieldSeparator - text between data fields
        Returns:
        text with the statistics: every character separated by a record separator and every type of edit operation separated by field separator.
